Pre-Game Insights: The game is the fifth meeting between the two teams this season, with the Phillies leading the series 3-1.
Others: The game is scheduled for 6:40 p.m. EDT on September 24, 2024. The betting line favors the Cubs -126, with the Phillies +107 and an over/under of 8 1/2 runs.
Injuries: The Phillies have several injured players, including Rodolfo Castro (thumb), Austin Hays (kidney infection), Spencer Turnbull (back), and Luis Ortiz (ankle). The Cubs have a longer list of injured players, including Jorge Lopez (groin), Jordan Wicks (oblique), Brennen Davis (ankle), Nick Madrigal (finger), Julian Merryweather (knee), Ben Brown (neck), Luke Little (shoulder), Colten Brewer (hand), Yency Almonte (shoulder), Adbert Alzolay (forearm).
